feed.title: Cal.com Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Cal.com: v4.7.24
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • build: Node alpine libssl symlink fix by @emrysal in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/18127
  • fix: Salesforce - only call create prospect record once by @joeauyeung in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/18131
  • fix: CRM error log by @hariombalhara in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/18105
  • fix: store default booking fields when creating event by @supalarry in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/18108
  • feat: weights per attribute UI by @sean-brydon in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/18109
  • fix: early return if no users are found to prevent prisma error by @sean-brydon in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/18133
  • chore: add successRedirectUrl to event-types api v2 by @ThyMinimalDev in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/18136
  • fix: filling users logic by @hbjORbj in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/18128

Full Changelog: https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/compare/v4.7.22...v4.7.24

entry.title: New release for Cal.com: v4.7.25
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • fix: show tooltip below the delete button by @sanchitttt in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/18135
  • fix: update get booking output for v2 by @Ryukemeister in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/18082
  • fix: Searching users in admin page not working by @anikdhabal in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/18140
  • fix: default to 100 when attribute weight undefined by @CarinaWolli in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/18145
  • feat: update translations via @replexica by @calcom-bot in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/18139
  • fix: Prisma validation error in generateMetadata (workflows) by @emrysal in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/18149
  • refactor: improved observability in google calendar service by @zomars in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/18147
  • chore: fix misleading test names by @hbjORbj in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/18154
  • fix: ensure migrated pages are added to config.matcher in middleware by @hbjORbj in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/18153
  • chore: use getTranslate instead by @hbjORbj in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/18148
  • chore: i18n - remove hardcoded strings by @hbjORbj in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/18156
  • chore: Upgrade actions/upload-artifact to v4 by @keithwillcode in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/18160
  • fix: Hyperlinks not highlighted in eventmeta by @anikdhabal in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/18120
  • chore: small changes for platform booker embed by @ThyMinimalDev in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/18159
  • chore: /availability - Remove Pages Router / Render App Router by @hbjORbj in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/16517

New Contributors

  • @sanchitttt made their first contribution in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/18135

Full Changelog: https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/compare/v4.7.24...v4.7.25

entry.title: New release for Cal.com: v4.8.0
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • fix: Invalid time zone specified: Etc/Unknown by @anikdhabal in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/18121
  • fix: add no show guest by @Udit-takkar in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/18075
  • fix: wrong workflow notifications when enabling workflows by @CarinaWolli in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/18169
  • fix: improve getAllUserBooking filter by teamIds by @ThyMinimalDev in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/18171
  • fix: don't send reassingment email to attendee for past events by @CarinaWolli in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/18173
  • chore: bump platform libraries version for api-v2 by @ThyMinimalDev in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/18174
  • revert: "fix: correct line-breaks in calendar event description" by @zomars in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/18175
  • fix: change trigger time for form submitted not booked webhook by @CarinaWolli in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/18176
  • fix: app router - viewport / favicon metadata by @hbjORbj in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/18177
  • fix: trpc/react-query â€” only one query client should exist by @hbjORbj in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/18179
  • feat: update translations via @replexica by @calcom-bot in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/18158
  • chore: update app layout by @hbjORbj in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17126

Full Changelog: https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/compare/v4.7.25...v4.8.0

entry.title: New release for Cal.com: v4.8.1
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • fix: Next.js bundle analysis build error by @keithwillcode in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/18193
  • fix: Booking questions order correction in confirmation email by @VenkataRohan in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/18192
  • feat: insights filter refactoring by @eunjae-lee in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/18167
  • feat: added office 365 video to conferencing atoms by @SomayChauhan in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/18067
  • fix: routing form insights and refactoring by @anikdhabal in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/18207
  • fix: bookings parsing errors by @supalarry in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/18200

New Contributors

  • @VenkataRohan made their first contribution in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/18192

Full Changelog: https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/compare/v4.8.0...v4.8.1

entry.title: New release for Cal.com: v4.8.2
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • refactor: getContacts by @Udit-takkar in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/18137
  • perf: improve insights where query and type fix by @emrysal in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/18211
  • fix: trigger guest no show bug by @Udit-takkar in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/18164
  • chore: bring back availability step by @hbjORbj in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/18205
  • feat: Booker atom slots callbacks by @supalarry in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/18203
  • chore: New booking perf tracing by @keithwillcode in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/18212
  • perf: limit # of host members for OG image by @hbjORbj in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/18219
  • fix: column f.userid does not exist by @anikdhabal in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/18215
  • chore: improve prisma exception filter messages by @ThyMinimalDev in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/18227
  • fix: webhook page improvements by @Udit-takkar in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/18220
  • fix: redirect on calendar oauth denied auth by @ThyMinimalDev in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/18228
  • refactor: added ApiPropertyOptional decorator for optional fields in api for better documentation by @SomayChauhan in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/18208
  • chore: add TLD in username of managed users by @ThyMinimalDev in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/18229
  • feat: v2 wildcard redirectURIs by @supalarry in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/18165
  • fix: private team does not hide team members for managed event type by @anikdhabal in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/18166
  • fix: bookerEmbed atom by @Ryukemeister in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/18168
  • perf: More tracing for handleNewBooking by @keithwillcode in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/18233
  • feat: v2 teams CRUD by @supalarry in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/18019
  • feat: allows forcing/skipping calendar cache serving by @zomars in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/18224

Full Changelog: https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/compare/v4.8.1...v4.8.2
